mapper.insert: INSERT INTO insa ( sabun, name, id, pwd, hp, reg_no, eng_name, phone, years, email, job_type, sex, zip, addr1, addr2, pos_gbn_code, dept_code, salary, gart_level, put_yn, mil_yn, mil_type, mil_level, mil_startdate, mil_enddate, kosa_reg_yn, kosa_class_code, join_day, retire_day, cmp_reg_no, cmp_reg_image, crm_name, self_intro ) VALUES ( (select nvl(max(sabun)+1,1) from insa), #{name}, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{hp}, #{reg_no}, #{eng_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone}, #{years, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email}, #{job_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pos_gbn_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dept_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salary, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gart_level, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{put_yn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mil_yn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mil_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mil_level, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mil_startdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mil_enddate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kosa_reg_yn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kosa_class_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{join_day, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{retire_day, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmp_reg_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmp_reg_image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crm_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{self_intro, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT sabun, join_day, retire_day, put_yn, name, reg_no, eng_name, phone, hp, pos_gbn_code, cmp_reg_no, bsave_name as cmp_reg_image, bfile_path as cmp_reg_link, sex, years, email, zip, addr1, addr2, dept_code, join_gbn_code, i.id, pwd, salary, kosa_reg_yn, kosa_class_code, mil_yn, mil_type, mil_level, mil_startdate, mil_enddate, job_type, gart_level, self_intro, crm_name, f.save_name as profile, rsave_name as resume, rfile_path as resumelink FROM insa i , files f, bfiles b, rfiles r WHERE i.id = ( SELECT id FROM insa WHERE sabun = #{sabun} ) and i.id = f.id and i.id = bid and i.id = rid
